statements: SELECT * FROM trading_fees WHERE transaction_type = 'Buy' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, fee_amount FROM trading_fees WHERE fee_amount > 100 ORDER BY fee_amount ASC
SELECT transaction_date, fee_amount, expense_description FROM trading_fees WHERE expense_description IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM trading_fees WHERE transaction_type = 'Sell' AND fee_amount < 50
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, expense_description FROM trading_fees WHERE transaction_type = 'Transfer'
SELECT * FROM trading_fees ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, fee_amount ASC
SELECT transaction_type, SUM(fee_amount) AS total_fee FROM trading_fees GROUP BY transaction_type
SELECT * FROM trading_fees WHERE fee_amount > 1000 AND transaction_type = 'SELL'
SELECT AVG(fee_amount) AS average_fee FROM trading_fees
SELECT DISTINCT transaction_type FROM trading_fees
SELECT * FROM trading_fees;
SELECT fee_id, fee_amount, fee_type FROM trading_fees WHERE fee_type = 'Trading Fee';
SELECT fee_amount, transaction_date, fee_type FROM trading_fees ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM arbitrage_expenses WHERE expense_amount > 500;
SELECT expense_description, expense_amount FROM arbitrage_expenses WHERE expense_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT fee_id, fee_amount, fee_type FROM trading_fees WHERE fee_type = 'Exchange Fee';
SELECT * FROM arbitrage_expenses WHERE expense_amount > 100 ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, SUM(fee_amount) AS total_fees FROM trading_fees GROUP BY transaction_id HAVING SUM(fee_amount) > 1000;
SELECT expense_description, expense_amount, COUNT(*) AS count FROM arbitrage_expenses GROUP BY expense_description, expense_amount ORDER BY count DESC, expense_amount ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, expense_description FROM trading_fees JOIN arbitrage_expenses ON trading_fees.transaction_id = arbitrage_expenses.transaction_id WHERE fee_amount > expense_amount;
SELECT * FROM trading_fees;
SELECT fee_amount, fee_type FROM trading_fees WHERE id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, fee_amount, timestamp FROM trading_fees ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, fee_type FROM trading_fees WHERE fee_amount > 100.00;
SELECT * FROM arbitrage_expenses WHERE expense_type = 'Exchange Fee';
SELECT * FROM cost_analysis WHERE total_cost > 1000
SELECT fee_type, fee_amount FROM trading_fees WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, expense_type FROM arbitrage_expenses WHERE expense_amount < 500
SELECT * FROM trading_fees WHERE fee_type LIKE '%withdrawal%' ORDER BY fee_amount DESC
SELECT transaction_id, total_cost FROM cost_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT * FROM trading_fees;
SELECT trade_id, fee_amount, currency_pair FROM trading_fees WHERE trade_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT transaction_id, expense_type, vendor_name FROM transaction_expenses ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM arbitrage_transactions WHERE profit_loss > 5000;
SELECT analysis_id, total_cost, net_profit FROM cost_analysis WHERE total_cost > 10000 AND net_profit < 5000;
SELECT * FROM trading_fees WHERE fee_amount > 100 ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, expense_type, expense_amount FROM transaction_expenses WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT trade_id, fee_amount, currency_pair FROM trading_fees WHERE fee_amount < 50 AND currency_pair = 'BTCUSD' ORDER BY trade_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM cost_analysis WHERE total_cost > 1000 AND net_profit < 500 ORDER BY analysis_id DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM transaction_expenses GROUP BY vendor_name HAVING total_expenses > 5000;
SELECT * FROM trading_fees ORDER BY fee_amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;
SELECT exchange_name, fee_amount, fee_currency FROM trading_fees WHERE fee_amount > 100 ORDER BY fee_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM arbitrage_transactions WHERE buy_amount > sell_amount;
SELECT MAX(cost_amount) AS max_cost, MIN(cost_amount) AS min_cost FROM transaction_costs;
SELECT transaction_id, analysis_type FROM transaction_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM trading_fees ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, fee_amount ASC;
SELECT exchange_name, fee_amount, fee_currency FROM trading_fees WHERE fee_amount > 100 ORDER BY fee_amount DESC;
SELECT buy_exchange_name, sell_exchange_name, buy_amount, sell_amount FROM arbitrage_transactions WHERE buy_amount > sell_amount;
SELECT exchange_name, cost_currency, transaction_date FROM transaction_costs WHERE exchange_name = 'Binance';
SELECT analysis_type, analysis_result FROM transaction_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
